name: nicotiana
content:

any of several plants that produce sweet-smelling flowers, including the plants from whose leaves tobacco is made: I planted some nicotianas in the back row of the border. I could smell the strong scent of nicotiana. Synonym
flowering tobacco
More examplesFewer examplesOnce the tulips are finished, I take them out and fill the gaps with late-summer bloomers such as nicotiana and dahlias.The nicotiana opens its flowers in the evening and sends out a clean-smelling scent.Nicotianas are resourceful plants that are able to survive a regime of neglect.
